name: super-luck

effect.black-white: This Pokémon's moves have critical hit rates one stage higher than normal.
effect.black-2-white-2: This Pokémon's moves have critical hit rates one stage higher than normal.

short_effect: Raises moves' critical hit rates one stage.

flavor_text.black-white: Heightens the critical- hit ratios of moves.
